price: Kisha tutawaokoa wale walio mchamngu; na tutawaacha madhaalimu humo wamepiga magoti.
arabic: ثُمَّ نُنَجِّي ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَواْ وَّنَذَرُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ فِيهَا جِثِيّٗا

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: thumma nunajjī alladhīna ittaqaw wanadharu al-ẓālimīna fīhā jithiyyan
